snippet: The Devils announced that Cory Schneider would start in goal at Pittsburgh on Thursday, ending Martin Brodeur’s run of 18 consecutive starts in season openers.
abstract: New Jersey Devils announce that Cory Schneider will start in goal in game against Pittsburgh Penguins, ending Martin Brodeur’s run of 18 consecutive starts in season openers.
lead_paragraph: The Devils announced that Cory Schneider would start in goal at Pittsburgh on Thursday, ending Martin Brodeur’s run of 18 consecutive starts in season openers.
